uc3m.bomberman.main

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • uc3m.bomberman.main.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    This class stores and handles all the information needed to execute the game, being helped by other classes (see below).
    See Also:
    {@link Map}, {@link Entity}, {@link Player}

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Game(int dim, java.lang.String playerName, int nLevels)
      This constructor creates a game with nLevels number of dim x dim maps (levels), and creates a Player with name playerName

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Adds an entity to entities such that there are no null pointers in it and there are no repeated ids.

      Removes all entities from the array
      void explodeAt(Coordinates bombPos)
      Creates an explosion with center bombPos and range that of the player

      This method selects the next map

      This method regenerates the current selected level

      Removes an entity from entities such that there are no null pointers left in it and the id's do not repeat
      boolean setMap(int level)
      Sets the selected level to level
      void setPlayerAction(java.lang.String action)
      Sets the current player keyboard press/action

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game(int dim,
            java.lang.String playerName,
            int nLevels)
        This constructor creates a game with nLevels number of dim x dim maps (levels), and creates a Player with name playerName
        Parameters:
        dim - dimension of the map
        playerName - name of the player
        nLevels - number of levels

    • Method Detail

      • getMap

        public Map getMap()
        Returns:
        Current selected level

      • recreateCurrentLevel

        public void recreateCurrentLevel()
        This method regenerates the current selected level

      • nextMap

        public int nextMap()
        This method selects the next map
        Returns:
        If no more levels are available, -1; if there is one more level, it returns the score associated to the time bonus (1 point per second, up to 3 minutes)

      • setMap

        public boolean setMap(int level)
        Sets the selected level to level
        Parameters:
        level -
        Returns:
        true if the level exists; false otherwise

      • addEntity

        public boolean addEntity(Entity entity)
        Adds an entity to entities such that there are no null pointers in it and there are no repeated ids.
        Parameters:
        entity -
        Returns:
        true if the entity has been added succesfully, false otherwise

      • removeEntity

        public boolean removeEntity(int id)
        Removes an entity from entities such that there are no null pointers left in it and the id's do not repeat
        Parameters:
        id -
        Returns:
        true if the entity exists and has been removed; false otherwise

      • clearEntities

        public void clearEntities()
        Removes all entities from the array

      • spawnEnemies

        public void spawnEnemies()
        Adds entities according to the blueprint provided by the selected map
        See Also:
        {@link Map#getEnemiesPos()}

      • explodeAt

        public void explodeAt(Coordinates bombPos)
        Creates an explosion with center bombPos and range that of the player
        Parameters:
        bombPos -
        See Also:
        {@link Map#setExplosionAt(Coordinates, String)} is used to set the explosions in the appropriate tiles

      • getEntities

        public Entity[] getEntities()
        Returns:
